sentences.en: He was confirmed as a member of the Methodist Church.
sentences.cn: 他受了坚信礼成为卫理公会的一员。

sentences.en: Edwards is a Methodist lay preacher and social worker.
sentences.cn: 爱德华兹是一位卫理公会的世俗布道者和社工。

sentences.en: The Methodist church is viewed as a bellwether of U.S. attitudes in large part.
sentences.cn: 卫理公会派教堂在很大程度上被认为是美国立场的风向标。
